name: WhatsApp Hotels
description: Add a WhatsApp button that connects guests directly to your hotel. Perfect for hotels, resorts, and accommodations looking to handle bookings, inquiries, and guest services through WhatsApp!

settings.content:
🏨 Welcome to [Your Hotel Name] ✨

Thank you for your interest in staying with us! We're here to make your stay exceptional.

🌟 OUR ACCOMMODATIONS:

🛏️ Deluxe Rooms
• Spacious comfort
• Modern amenities
• City views

👑 Suite Collection
• Luxury living space
• Premium facilities
• VIP services

🏖️ Special Rooms
• Beachfront villas
• Family rooms
• Executive suites

✨ WHY CHOOSE US?
✅ Prime Location - Central to attractions
✅ Luxury Amenities - Full-service spa & pool
✅ 24/7 Service - Always at your service
✅ Fine Dining - World-class restaurants

📍 HOTEL INFORMATION:
⏰ Check-in: [Check-in Time]
⌛ Check-out: [Check-out Time]
📞 WhatsApp: [Your Number]
🌐 Website: [Your Website]
📍 Address: [Your Address]

🎉 HOTEL SERVICES:
• Room Service
• Concierge
• Airport Transfer
• Spa & Wellness

💫 SPECIAL OFFERS:
• Early Bird Discounts
• Extended Stay Packages
• Seasonal Promotions
• Loyalty Rewards

📱 HOW TO BOOK:
1. Check availability
2. Select your dates
3. Choose your room
4. We'll confirm your stay!

Ready to book your stay? Message us now! 🌟
